contact.front: Contact me to make your *projects come *true

presentation.title: Hello, I'm Aria
presentation.name: Alessandro Fernandez
presentation.phrase: I am passionate about digital tools to serve users.
presentation.description: I am a Full Stack developer with experience in front-end and back-end web applications, as well as in the development of mobile applications and databases, I am passionate about learning new technologies and I like design.

habilities.0: Full Stack Developer with 1 year of experience in the design and development of web and mobile applications.
habilities.1: Experience in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS and JavaScript, ensuring an optimal and adaptable user experience.
habilities.2: Back-end knowledge using languages such as Node.js, Python or PHP, managing databases and server architectures.
habilities.3: Design of attractive and functional user interfaces, collaborating with design teams to achieve the desired visual identity.
habilities.4: Skills in testing and debugging, ensuring the quality and performance of applications.
habilities.5: Experience in creating and maintaining mobile applications using frameworks such as React Native.
habilities.6: Knowledge in content management systems (CMS) and databases, facilitating the administration and organization of information.
habilities.7: Ability to learn new technologies and adapt quickly to changes in the world of web development.
habilities.8: Project management skills, coordinating and supervising multidisciplinary teams for project success.
habilities.9: Values such as multitasking, problem solving, good communication, attention to detail and curiosity to investigate, contributing to an efficient and collaborative work environment.
